message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $130 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I need to make a bit more on this product.  How about $125? That's still a great price for something you'll really enjoy.
Hi Alice, I've been thinking about it and I'm still only able to offer $120 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
